Space ID is a BNB Chain-native Web3 domain name service that provides .bnb domains. It offers a universal name service SDK supporting multi-chain name resolution across BNB Chain, Ethereum, Arbitrum, and other networks. Backed by Binance, it's integral to the BSC identity layer.

- .bnb domain registration, management, and renewal

- ID token staking and governance
